"The Reason You Were Born":
"This is where the past, present and future
meet. An ending for one who pursues a
never-ending story with but a single
goal in their heart. Everyone must fight
to bring an end to this eternal tragedy,
but two people must give all.
There is but one goal. To give meaning to
her life. To answer the original prayer.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being incapacitated."
